name: CrazXRacing HighLight
description:
Discover new Speed and Incredible Vertigo Sensations!
Enjoy total visibility!

Race your extremely powerful XCar on no less than 10 different tracks!
Be careful! You have competition, and the difficulty keeps increasing!
Many Ghost Drivers on the road try to decrease your speed.
You will find many Bonus and Malus on the road! Take the right...
Maybe you will need to brake during your race... Simply touch the screen to do that.

Hit Checkpoints to get Extended Time!
Customize your XCar, and become the Top Driver!
You have the possibility to try all tracks before compete.

Get many $ on each track and try to be in the Top 3 to keep your money to buy a better XCar and break all records!

The score of each race is recorded.
Share your score online and tries to stay in the world ranking!
The flag of your country will appear on the international scores table.
So you can compete with players around the World!
You can see the rankings at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores".

••• Game Features •••

• Incredible Speed and Vertigo Sensation
• Enjoy total visibility
• Great arcade physics
• Huge jumping
• Spectacular SFX
• Get many $ to buy better XCars
• Customize your XCar
• Training mode
• Realistic sound environment
• Original Music
• Some Bonus to increase your speed and reduce your XCar damage
• Select the difficulty level
• Use accelerometer or virtual arrows to control your XCar
• Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking
